AI Description: Intel Threading Building Blocks (TBB) is a C++ template library developed by Intel for task parallelism. It provides a rich and complete approach to expressing parallelism in a highly efficient and scalable manner.
Core Features: Task Parallelism Support, Scalability For Multi-Core Processing, Thread-Safe Containers & Algorithms, Dynamic Task Scheduling, Portable & Flexible Design
General Tags: Parallel Computing, C++ Library, Multi-Core Processing
